“Pray without ceasing.” — 1 Thessalonians 5:17

Reflection:
Let breath itself become prayer; every step an act of faith. In unbroken communion, even silence speaks to heaven.

Commentary:
This verse calls for a living rhythm of prayer — not endless words, but continual awareness of God in every thought and task.
